entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
